text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Your potential is limitless. Keep learning, keep growing.
author: Carol S. Dweck

text: Every question you answer brings you one step closer to mastery.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Knowledge is power, and you're getting stronger every day.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Make today's learning tomorrow's success.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The best time to learn is now. The best place to start is here.
author: Confucius

text: Your dedication to learning today shapes your success tomorrow.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Every challenge is an opportunity to grow stronger.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: The mind is like a muscle - the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets.
author: Jim Kwik

text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: The only limit to your learning is your willingness to try.
author: Carol S. Dweck

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
author: Alfred Mercier

text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: Little things make big days.
author: Isabel Marant

text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown

text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown

text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Unknown

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen R. Covey

text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Unknown

text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

text: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

text: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Jerry Dunn

text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: George Lorimer

text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

text: Little by little, a little becomes a lot.
author: Tanzanian Proverb

text: If you want something you never had, you have to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Doubt whom you will, but never yourself.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

text: You are capable of amazing things.
author: Unknown

text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

text: You don't have to be perfect to be amazing.
author: Unknown

text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

text: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

text: You are never too old to learn something new.
author: Unknown

text: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
author: Henry Ford

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
author: African Proverb

text: You are the artist of your own life. Don't hand the paintbrush to anyone else.
author: Unknown

text: The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.
author: Paul Halmos

text: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

text: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

text: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
author: Swati Sharma

text: You don't have to be the best, you just have to be better than you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
author: Joel Brown

text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: The only thing that is constant is change.
author: Heraclitus

text: The only thing that separates success from failure is one last attempt. Try one more time and you will get lucky.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

text: The only thing that can stop you is the doubt that you carry in your mind.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that matters is how you see yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is impossible is the thing you never try.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is truly yours is your education.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is permanent is change.
author: Heraclitus

text: The only thing that is certain is uncertainty.
author: Pliny the Elder

text: The only thing that is real is the present moment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

text: The only thing that is important is to keep learning.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

text: The only thing that is worth doing is what you do for others.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth having is a dream.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth fighting for is your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth living for is your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth dying for is your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth believing in is yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth loving is yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth respecting is yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth admiring is yourself.
author: Unknown

text: The only thing that is worth achieving is your dreams.
author: Unknown
